sense.def:
To sabotage something
pomeni nekaj namerno poškodovati ali uničiti.

seg.quote: The power station had been sabotaged by anti-government guerrillas.
...widespread sabotage and the disruption of rail communications.

sense.def:
To sabotage a plan or activity
pomeni namerno preprečiti uspešno izvedbo načrta ali dejavnosti.

seg.quote: I don't wish to be accused of sabotaging the President's programme.
